name: GRBY
description: An animation made in 2007 based on code written by the fantastic Jared ‘Levitated’ Tarbell (http://levitated.net/jt/index.html). I exchanged the existing moviesclips with my people movieclips. In 2014 this animation was adapted to fit in the 'Don't Panic' compilation. 2007 CR 555 https://hansup.be/2007_grby_animation_hans-verhaegen.html
